description: A 3rd year junior high school student. She is the second youngest of the Ikaruga family and a professional cartoonist. She uses her siblings and Yoichi as a basis for her manga by manipulating the scenario`s surrounding them for the best results. She also seems to most knowledgeable about relationships out of the sisters as she flirts with Yoichi while poking fun at the others. She is the only person in the Ikaruga family to wear glasses.
name: Ikaruga Chihaya
